are_staked_for_dual_incentives.description: True if MARS--UST LP Shares are currently staked with Astroport Generator for dual staking incentives

are_staked_for_single_incentives.description: True if MARS--UST LP Shares are currently staked with the MARS LP Staking contract

global_astro_reward_index.description: index used to keep track of $ASTRO claimed as LP staking rewards and distribute them proportionally among the auction participants

global_mars_reward_index.description: index used to keep track of $MARS claimed as LP staking rewards and distribute them proportionally among the auction participants

lp_shares_minted.description: Total LP shares minted post liquidity addition to the MARS-UST Pool

lp_shares_withdrawn.description: Number of LP shares that have been withdrawn as they unvest

pool_init_timestamp.description: Timestamp at which liquidity was added to the MARS-UST LP Pool

total_mars_deposited.description: Total MARS tokens delegated to the contract by lockdrop participants / airdrop recepients

total_ust_deposited.description: Total UST deposited in the contract

Decimal256.description: A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal256(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0 The greatest possible value that can be represented is 115792089237316195423570985008687907853269984665640564039457.584007913129639935 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
